tags.name: Sentinel activities
tags.description: Sentinel activities are used to track and manage user authentication attempts, including successful and failed attempts. Based on your sentinel policy settings, Logto will automatically block users after a certain number of failed attempts. This helps to prevent unauthorized access and protect sensitive data.

post.description: Remove sentinel activity reports based on the provided target value(identifier).Use this endpoint to unblock users who may be locked out due to too many failed authentication attempts.
